title: أقوى توكيدات النجاح والثقة وعدم الاستسلام | برمجة العقل للازدهار المستمر 💪✨
description:
استمع يومياً لأقوى التوكيدات الصوتية التي ستعزز الثقة بالنفس، النجاح، الإصرار، وعدم الاستسلام، وتساعدك على الوصول إلى الازدهار المستمر في حياتك.
✨ هذه الجلسة الصوتية تعمل على برمجة عقلك الباطن لإزالة المعتقدات المحدودة، وزرع طاقة إيجابية تدفعك لتحقيق أهدافك بسهولة ويسر.
🎧 كرّر هذه التوكيدات صباحاً أو قبل النوم، ودعها تشحن طاقتك بالتحفيز والقوة والنجاح في كل يوم."

title: مهارات تجعلك قيما/المهارة الرابعة/الإستعانة بمصادر خارجية
description:
النجاح يحب السرعة و التركيز على الأنشطة المدرة للربح لكن بناء مشروع  يحتاج العديد من الأمور التي من شأنها تضييع وقتك بشكل كبير إن لم تلقي لها بالا من البداية، تعلم كيف تتغلب على هذا الأمر في هذا الفيديو.
هنا تجد رابط التكوين الذي قمت بكتابته و تقديمه و هو عبارة عن كل ما ستحتاج من معلومات كافية لتبدأ في بناء علامتك التجارية الخاصة دون الإضطرار إلى التوقف و البحث عن ما يكمل هذه المعلومات ( بالطبع أتحدث عن البدايات فقط أما الإحتياج للمعلومات فهو دائم).

title: مصطفى محمود : الغضروف… مرض العصر بسبب الكسل وسوء استعمال الجسد | العلم والإيمان
description:
مرض الغضروف أصبح من أمراض العصر الحديث.
في هذا المقطع من برنامج العلم والإيمان، يوضح الدكتور مصطفى محمود أن الحياة المدنية سهلت كل شيء للإنسان لدرجة أنها أخرجته عن فطرته الطبيعية، وأدت إلى ضعف العضلات وسوء استعمال الجسد، مما تسبب في تلفيات كثيرة، أبرزها مرض الغضروف أو الديسك.

💭 أهم النقاط التي يوضحها الدكتور محمود:
المدنية الحديثة جعلت الإنسان أكثر كسلاً: السيارة أمام الباب، الأكل جاهز مطبوخ، لا يحتاج لاستخدام عضلاته أو أسنانه.
هذه الراحة الزائدة أدت إلى ركود عضلي وفقدان نشاط العديد من أعضاء الجسد، مما تسبب في تلفيات مختلفة.
من أبرز هذه التلفيات مرض الغضروف أو الديسك، الذي أصبح شائعًا بين الكثيرين في العصر الحديث.
الدكتور يشرح كيف يحدث التلف في العمود الفقري نتيجة سوء استعمال العضلات وعدم الحركة الطبيعية.

🧠 رسالة الدكتور مصطفى محمود:
الإنسان خُلق ليستخدم جسده بشكل طبيعي؛ أي خروج عن هذه الفطرة يؤدي إلى مشاكل صحية كبيرة، منها مرض الغضروف، ضعف العضلات، وآلام الظهر.

📺 شاهد الفيديو الكامل هنا:
https://youtu.be/xRW7NZ7hZJU

✨ تفاعل مع القناة:
👍 اضغط إعجابًا إذا أعجبك الفيديو.
🔔 اشترك في القناة لتصلك مقاطع نادرة من برنامج العلم والإيمان.
💬 شاركنا في التعليقات: هل شعرت يومًا بآلام الظهر نتيجة الكسل أو الجلوس الطويل؟

title: Luka Babic of Orgnostic TALREOS Talk 23 with Al Adamsen
description:
Key insights

🌍 The use of data and AI as a facilitator challenges the way we interact with data and has the potential to revolutionize access to information in the future.
🧠 Creating self-service tools for HR analytics can empower organizations to efficiently handle repetitive and menial tasks, enabling a more productive and agile workforce.
📚 Upskilling and improving data literacy levels are essential for effectively utilizing people analytics and making data-driven decisions.
💡 The level of aptitude and culture in a company plays a significant role in driving the adoption of people analytics and data-driven decision-making.
💡 The speaker emphasizes the need for CEOs to be involved in the adoption of people analytics, as it can have a significant impact on business outcomes.
🚀 The speed of technology development and adoption needs to be embraced by organizations, even when it comes to testing generative AI capabilities.
🌐 Luka Babic and his team are actively working on creating events and master classes to upskill and make knowledge more available for HR professionals, particularly in the field of data utilization.
🌟 "Everything is there, you're doing great work across the board, so please keep it up."

The key idea of the interview is that organizations should embrace automation and generative AI in order to improve people analytics and make data-driven decisions more efficiently.

1. 00:00 🚀 Agnostic's generative AI revolutionizes people analytics by automating data queries and challenging traditional dashboarding, enabling fast and meaningful access to data.

2. 02:34 📈 Organizations need to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of their tools by automating repetitive tasks, especially in data engineering, to enable efficient people analytics and self-service capabilities.

3. 04:40 📊 Self-service dashboarding in Power BI has benefits but also requires additional workforce and time, so companies should consider outsourcing or finding more effective ways to distribute and interact with data.

4. 06:43 📊 It is important to assess the level of aptitude and culture in organizations for data-driven decisions, and focus on specific use cases and scalable technology instead of building large internal people analytics teams.

5. 08:57 📊 People analytics and workforce planning are crucial for making informed decisions and avoiding financial implications, so CEOs should prioritize and understand their impact to adapt to changes in strategy and workforce.

6. 11:46 🚀 Embrace technology development, explore alternative algorithms, and adopt generative AI capabilities to maximize resources; test and discard ineffective methods quickly in SMBs.

7. 13:26 💡 People can learn more about agnostics and the company through their website, LinkedIn, and various events and master classes they offer to upskill HR professionals and provide knowledge on data utilization.

8. 14:32 👍 Everything is going well and the speaker appreciates the work being done, wishes someone a happy birthday, and thanks everyone for joining.

Learn more at orgnostic.com

title: HOW I GOT RID OF (Obsessive Anxious Thinking & Painful Rumination)
description:
🛒 MY CANCER & HEALTH ESSENTIALS: https://www.amazon.com/shop/paulthomasmd?ref_=cm_sw_r_cp_ud_aipsfshop_5S8S37TNSR0YRSQR3807_1
NEED SOMEONE TO TALK TO? Book an appointment with me:  https://bignoknowllc.setmore.com/ 

Test your testosterone / Hormone levels with LetsGetChecked and take control of your physical and mental health. 
Get 20% off with this link and code: NOAH20: https://trylgc.com/noah
Noah Thomas (bignoknow) is an affiliate of LetsGetChecked

For business inquiry's:  thomasvisionsllc@gmail.com

Please SHARE, LIKE, COMMENT, and even FAVORITE THIS VIDEO if you found it useful or if you know somebody who it may benefit. Thank you. 

FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/bignoknowofficial
INSTAGRAM :http://instagram.com/bignoknow
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/bignoknow1


                                        DEPRESSION SCREENING TEST: http://healingfromdepression.com/depression-screening-test.htm                    
                                                
      This video is for educational and documentary purposes only and is not intended to treat or diagnose.  The opinions expressed are that of the individual in the video and nobody else.  Please consult a health care professional for all mental and physical healthcare needs. 

I Noah Thomas, the creator of this channel, have been diagnosed hypogonadism  by a medical doctor and legally  prescribed the medically indicated treatment of Testosterone Replacement Therapy.  

My Story

My name is Noah and on May 18 2011, I had a rare reaction to a medication called VIVITROL and consequently, spiraled into a suicidal depression with depersonalization and anxiety. I lost 25 lbs in 4 weeks and was in full panic or near panic for 8 weeks straight mixed with the darkest most painful depression I cold have ever imagined. I immediately could not work and had to move in with my parents who, along with many siblings and friends, had to watch me 24/7 as I was a danger to myself.  Eventually I was hospitalized in the Psych Ward for a week. Getting through each day seemed truly unbearable and I knew I would surely die. I have been put on many many different doctor prescribed  SSRI's SNRI's Tricyclics, mood stabilizers, anti-psychotics, holistic meds, acupuncture and even a form of shock therapy called RTMS. I barely saw any improvement in my condition for a full year. It was decided I had treatment resistant depression and I spent nearly every moment in tears. Weeks after starting my newest round of medications (Seroquel & Nortryptaline) as a last ditch effort, I had my blood drawn for possible hormone imbalances and my Testosterone levels came back 200 ng/Dl and 150 ng/Dl. The average 25 year old male has 750 ng/Dl. With this discovery I had an explanation as to why I was not getting better and why I might be so so sick. The symptoms of Low T are very similar to those of major depression. I started legally prescribed testosterone replacement therapy soon after and have been checking in with the world and documenting my experience with treatment as well as giving my insight and perspective on various topics of mental health. I am blessed to say that I have slowly, over the last 6 years, been improving and becoming more stable which I never thought to be possible. My low T manifested itself in the form of Major depression, anxiety, and depersonalization/ derealization for over a year. Treating  my low testosterone has been 1 HUGE part of the puzzle but I have had to continue to work hard to hold on to my mental stability with many set backs.  Gaining some mental stability back is nothing short of a miracle as I was near death for what felt like forever. I do not consider myself to be totally healed yet but I am closer now then ever before and aim to use what I have been through to help or at least offer support to others in need I was able to successfully come off my Seroquel and Pamelor.

I work out all the time as a part of my mental health recovery!!! Weight training and all kinds of cardio rule much of my free time and I also share this on my channel.

Noah Thomas (bignoknow) is an affiliate of LetsGetChecked

title: The Comfort of Not Thinking (Napoleon Hill Motivation)

title: The Laziness Trap in Technology Adoption
description:
Technology integration follows a predictable pattern. We start with healthy skepticism, move to appreciation, then often slide into over-reliance and laziness, surrendering our judgment to machines we shouldn't fully trust. This progression explains why some leaders maintain their edge while others become dependent on technological crutches. Have you noticed this pattern in your own relationship with technology? The journey toward meaningful leadership in the digital age requires maintaining the human element, judgment, intuition, and critical thinking, alongside technological adoption. What guardrails have you established to prevent over-reliance on technology in your decision-making? 

#StayHuman #Don’tTrustTheMachine #HumanInTheLoop #MindfulTech #AIWithCaution #StayCurious #TechNeedsOversight #KeepThinking #CriticalNotComplacent #UseTechWisely #10xYourTeam #leadership #strategicthinking #decisionmaking #technologybalance

title: Are We Outsourcing Our Minds to much to Machines?
description:
Are We Outsourcing Our Minds to much to Machines? 

The Hidden Cost of AI Convenience

We’re living in the golden age of artificial intelligence — and while it’s revolutionising how we work, think, and even feel, have we stopped to ask:
Are we depending on it too much?
From decision-making to emotional support, AI is stepping in where human effort used to be essential.

But at what cost?
Could this growing reliance be shrinking our attention spans, weakening our problem-solving skills, and even blurring our sense of identity?

It’s not about fearmongering — it’s about finding balance.
Let’s explore how to use AI as a tool, not a crutch.

👇 What are your thoughts? Do you think we’re leaning too hard on machines?

#AIOverload #MentalHealthMatters #DigitalWellbeing #HumanVsMachine #TechTalk #MindfulTech #AIandUs #SocialMediaPsychology #FutureOfThinking #DigitalBalance #AIReflection #AIintheRealWorld #TherapyTalks #PsychologyPost

title: Surrendering your Intellect to Lord Krishna | Swami Mukundananda
description:
The concept of Surrender to God has been emphasized in spirituality, especially in the path of Bhakti Yog. 

Few spiritual aspirants may wonder, "We all have an intellect, mind, and the ability to think, so why surrender our intellect to Lord Krishna or the Guru?”

Watch this video fully to learn as Swami Mukundananda relates a few powerful examples to explain it in detail.

Subscribe to Swami Mukundananda Bhakti : https://bit.ly/3ck0biR

About Swami Mukundananda

Swami Mukundananda is a global spiritual leader, philosopher, visionary, author, and humanitarian.  He is the founder of JKYog (Jagadguru Kripaluji Yog), which offers a unique Yogic System known as Yoga for Body, Mind, and Soul. 

Swamiji has distinguished engineering and management degrees from two world-famous Institutes in India, IIT and IIM. Swami Mukundananda took the renounced order of life after giving up his promising corporate career. He is a senior disciple of Jagadguru Shree Kripaluji Maharaj, who entrusted him with spreading Vedic Knowlege and Bhakti Yog throughout the world.

In this channel, Swamiji explains the profound knowledge of scriptures like Bhagavad Gita, Srimad Bhagavatham, Narad Bhakti Darshan, Ramayan, Mahabharat, and other Bhakti topics with sound logic that is easy to understand and apply in our daily life.

title: How to surrender mind to God | Q&A with Swami Mukundananda | JKYog Spiritual Retreat
description:
To receive inspirational videos of Swami Mukundananda:
Join JKYog Inspiration WhatsApp Group: https://bit.ly/3dU9N5D

A devotee asked Swami Mukundananda for guidance on how to surrender our mind to God and more specifically, how to surrender the intellect. Swami ji graciously shared a divine explanation of how our mind, body, intellect, and ego interact and what needs to happen to progress in surrender. Swami ji explained that things of the world that we consider "mine" are actually false impressions. The real "mine" is the Lord. In the material world, the things we associate with give a false sense of mine. The thing of critical importance here is our mind and how we surrender that to God. Swami ji clarified that one can't submit the mind until the intellect is submitted. 

Understand that beyond the mind is the intellect. Subtler than the senses are the objects of the senses. Subtler than the objects of the senses is the mind. Subtler than the mind itself is the intellect. Subtler than the intellect is the soul. So, until the intellect makes a decision to surrender, the mind can't surrender. Naturally, then the question becomes how to surrender the intellect? Surrender can be interpreted as acceptance of knowledge of the scriptures as the truth. For example, scriptures say there is no happiness in the world, and your mind/intellect struggles and complains. Surrender, in this case, is to accept the knowledge that our scriptures are bestowing upon us. How many times do you feel that you are not the mind? Sometimes when the mind plays mischief, you realize that you are not the mind. At that time, you see that you are not the mind. What about the intellect? The meshing with the intellect is even stronger. Have you ever thought you are not the intellect? Sometimes in matters of faith, the intellect says opposite and faith keeps us going to the knowledge of scriptures, God and Guru. Beyond the intellect, comes the ego - when that is cut, then we will be situated in the divine knowledge. Lord Krishna told Arjun to surrender his intellect to God. We accept our intellect as the final authority. It occurs due to our pride in our intellect. When we make a decision that our intellect is tiny, impure and distorted by material attachment, we progress in surrender. For example, if I have to choose between what the scriptures and the Guru said vs. what my own intellect says, I will choose the knowledge of scriptures. This is surrender. When we start training the intellect, slowly we start surrendering. That is where faith is required in Vedic knowledge, God and Guru. 




About Swami Mukundananda:

Swami Mukundananda is a renowned spiritual leader, philosopher, visionary, author, and humanitarian.  He is the founder of the yogic system called “JKYog.”  Swamiji is a unique sanyasi (in the renounced order of life), with distinguished degrees in Engineering and Management from two world-famous Institutes in India, IIT and IIM.  He is a senior disciple of Jagadguru Shree Kripaluji Maharaj. Swamiji’s enlightening discourses clarify the deepest concepts of the Vedic scriptures with wit, humor, and perfect logic.  Along with his discourses, he teaches the comprehensive system “Yoga for the body, Mind and Soul”.  For the youth, Swamiji has conducted programs at prestigious universities such as Princeton, Stanford, Yale, MIT, Duke and Kellogg School of Management.  He has been invited to speak at various Fortune 500 companies like Google, Oracle, Intel, etc.  For children, he has established a special personality development program, called “Bal-Mukund Character Building Program.” He has inspired millions of people around the world on the path of spirituality, holistic health, yoga, meditation, service to society, and God-realization. Swamiji's warmth and humility touch all those who have had the fortune to have his association.

For full profile, visit: 
https://www.jkyog.org/swami-mukundananda

Like us on Facebook/Twitter:
https://www.facebook.com/Swami.Mukundananda
https://twitter.com/sw_mukundananda

Surrender, in this case, is to accept the knowledge that our scriptures are bestowing upon us. How many times do you feel that you are not the mind? Sometimes when the mind plays mischief, you realize that you are not the mind. At that time, you see that you are not the mind. What about the intellect? The meshing with the intellect is even stronger. Have you ever thought you are not the intellect? Sometimes in matters of faith, the intellect says opposite and faith keeps us going to the knowledge of scriptures, God and Guru. Beyond the intellect, comes the ego - when that is cut, then we will be situated in the divine knowledge. Lord Krishna told Arjun to surrender his intellect to God. We accept our intellect as the final authority. It occurs due to our pride in our intellect. When we make a decision that our intellect is tiny, impure and distorted by material attachment, we progress in surrender. For example, if I have to choose between what the scriptures and the Guru said vs. what my own intellect says, I will choose the knowledge of scriptures. This is surrender. When we start training the intellect, slowly we start surrendering. That is where faith is required in Vedic knowledge, God and Guru. 




About Swami Mukundananda:

Swami Mukundananda is a renowned spiritual leader, philosopher, visionary, author, and humanitarian.  He is the founder of the yogic system called “JKYog.”  Swamiji is a unique sanyasi (in the renounced order of life), with distinguished degrees in Engineering and Management from two world-famous Institutes in India, IIT and IIM.  He is a senior disciple of Jagadguru Shree Kripaluji Maharaj. Swamiji’s enlightening discourses clarify the deepest concepts of the Vedic scriptures with wit, humor, and perfect logic.  Along with his discourses, he teaches the comprehensive system “Yoga for the body, Mind and Soul”.  For the youth, Swamiji has conducted programs at prestigious universities such as Princeton, Stanford, Yale, MIT, Duke and Kellogg School of Management.  He has been invited to speak at various Fortune 500 companies like Google, Oracle, Intel, etc.  For children, he has established a special personality development program, called “Bal-Mukund Character Building Program.” He has inspired millions of people around the world on the path of spirituality, holistic health, yoga, meditation, service to society, and God-realization. Swamiji's warmth and humility touch all those who have had the fortune to have his association.

For full profile, visit: 
https://www.jkyog.org/swami-mukundananda

pretty_text:
Title: How to surrender mind to God | Q&A with Swami Mukundananda | JKYog Spiritual Retreat

Channel: Swami Mukundananda

Description: To receive inspirational videos of Swami Mukundananda:
Join JKYog Inspiration WhatsApp Group: https://bit.ly/3dU9N5D

A devotee asked Swami Mukundananda for guidance on how to surrender our mind to God and more specifically, how to surrender the intellect. Swami ji graciously shared a divine explanation of how our mind, body, intellect, and ego interact and what needs to happen to progress in surrender. Swami ji explained that things of the world that we consider "mine" are actually false impressions. The real "mine" is the Lord. In the material world, the things we associate with give a false sense of mine. The thing of critical importance here is our mind and how we surrender that to God. Swami ji clarified that one can't submit the mind until the intellect is submitted. 

Understand that beyond the mind is the intellect. Subtler than the senses are the objects of the senses. Subtler than the objects of the senses is the mind. Subtler than the mind itself is the intellect. Subtler than the intellect is the soul. So, until the intellect makes a decision to surrender, the mind can't surrender. Naturally, then the question becomes how to surrender the intellect? Surrender can be interpreted as acceptance of knowledge of the scriptures as the truth. For example, scriptures say there is no happiness in the world, and your mind/intellect struggles and complains. Surrender, in this case, is to accept the knowledge that our scriptures are bestowing upon us. How many times do you feel that you are not the mind? Sometimes when the mind plays mischief, you realize that you are not the mind. At that time, you see that you are not the mind. What about the intellect? The meshing with the intellect is even stronger. Have you ever thought you are not the intellect? Sometimes in matters of faith, the intellect says opposite and faith keeps us going to the knowledge of scriptures, God and Guru. Beyond the intellect, comes the ego - when that is cut, then we will be situated in the divine knowledge. Lord Krishna told Arjun to surrender his intellect to God. We accept our intellect as the final authority. It occurs due to our pride in our intellect. When we make a decision that our intellect is tiny, impure and distorted by material attachment, we progress in surrender. For example, if I have to choose between what the scriptures and the Guru said vs. what my own intellect says, I will choose the knowledge of scriptures. This is surrender. When we start training the intellect, slowly we start surrendering. That is where faith is required in Vedic knowledge, God and Guru.

title: La comodidad de pensar lo pensado: Sobre la ignorancia como forma de existencia 🧐| Ensayo filosófico
description:
Romper la burbuja es una invitación a volver a pensar: a salir del ruido, del automatismo, del simulacro que nos impide detenernos. Este libro es una travesía filosófica, íntima y radical que no pretende dar respuestas, sino incomodar con preguntas.

En sus páginas se explora el pensamiento no como un privilegio académico ni como una mera acumulación de conceptos, sino como un acto existencial, ético y político que duele, transforma y compromete.

Con un lenguaje claro pero profundo, que oscila entre el ensayo filosófico y la poesía meditativa, el autor propone recuperar el valor del silencio, del asombro, de la lentitud.

Pensar, aquí, no es sobrepensar ni simplemente opinar, sino desarmar creencias heredadas, hacer lugar al vacío, contemplar el mundo y atreverse a habitarlo con conciencia.

Este libro se convierte en una guía no para enseñar qué pensar, sino para mostrar cómo pensar. Porque pensar, dice el autor, duele. Pero también libera.

title: #104 La Pereza y los desafios de la digital
description:
¿Te sientes más perezoso de lo habitual? La tecnología puede ser la culpable. En este episodio de Voces Podcast, exploramos las causas de la pereza en la era digital y cómo combatirla.






Explora ideas que importan en psicología, tecnología, cultura y actualidad con invitados expertos y apasionados.



Encuentra:


     
      
  •  Episodios semanales con análisis en profundidad.
     
      
  •  Conversaciones estimulantes que te desafiarán a pensar.
     
      
  •  Un espacio para aprender, reflexionar y compartir ideas.
     
     


Temas:


     
      
  •  Autoconocimiento, desarrollo personal, relaciones, salud mental.
     
       
  •  Innovación, futuro del trabajo, impacto social, ética.
     
       
  •  Arte, música, literatura, cine, sociedad.
     
       
  •  Análisis de noticias, política, economía, medio ambiente.
     
     



#VocesPodcast #podcast #conversaciones #ideas #psicología #tecnología #cultura #actualidad

title: 6 señales de que NO es PEREZA, sino BURNOUT
description:
Hay mucho solapamiento entre la pereza y el BurnOut (agotamiento emocional o síndrome de estar quemado) que puede dificultar la diferenciación entre ambos. 
El burnout es un estado negativo de agotamiento emocional, físico y mental, provocado por un estrés excesivo y la incapacidad para hacerle frente. 
Ahora, más que nunca, es imperativo educar y comprender mejor la naturaleza del burnout. Para ello, aquí te traemos seis signos reveladores de que quizá lo que estás experimentando en este momento no es realmente pereza, sino burnout.

Disclaimer: Las orientaciones de este vídeo, que tiene únicamente fines educativos e informativos, no deben utilizarse para autodiagnosticar o diagnosticar a otros. No pretendemos sustituir el consejo, el diagnóstico o el tratamiento de un profesional de la salud mental. 

🔶 // Atribuciones \\
- Vídeo original (adaptado, traducido y doblado del inglés al español bajo licencia Creative Commons BY) de PSYCH2GO: "6 Signs You’re Burnt Out, Not Lazy" - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MLuJ249WnkE
Writer: Chloe Avenasa 
Script Editor: Rida Batool 
Script Manager: Kelly Soong 
Animator: Jonelz Leo
YouTube Manager: Cindy Cheong    

Referencias:
- Korunka, C., Tement, S., Zdrehus, C., & Borza, A. (2010). Burnout: Definition, recognition and prevention approaches. Family & Community Health: The Journal of Health Promotion & Maintenance, 43(3), 311-318.
- American Psychological Association (2013). Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders – 5th Edition. APA Publishing; Washington, DC.
- Leiter, M. P., Bakker, A. B., & Maslach, C. (Eds.). (2014). Burnout at work: A psychological perspective. Psychology Press.
- Greenglass, E., Fiksenbaum, L., & Burke, R. J. (1996). Components of social support, buffering effects and burnout: Implications for psychological functioning. Anxiety, stress, and coping, 9(3), 185-197.
- Cropanzano, R., Rupp, D. E., & Byrne, Z. S. (2003). The relationship of emotional exhaustion to work attitudes, job performance, and organizational citizenship behaviors. Journal of Applied psychology, 88(1), 160.

✍ // ÍNDICE DE CONTENIDOS
00:00 Introducción
00:05 1. Te sientes desconectado de todo
01:50 2. Antes estabas motivado
02:23 3. Antes eras una persona apasionada
02:58 4. Te has vuelto temperamental e irritable
03:35 5. Has descuidado tu autocuidado
04:13 6. Estos cambios se produjeron gradualmente

#SapienciaPractica
#burnout

title: Comment notre cerveau nous pousse à abandonner
description:
As-tu déjà ressenti que tu n’arrivais pas à avancer, même quand tu sais que tu pourrais réussir ? Ce sentiment d’impuissance peut venir de ce qu’on appelle « l’impuissance apprise », un phénomène où ton cerveau te conditionne inconsciemment à abandonner face aux défis.

Dans cette vidéo, découvre comment notre esprit peut nous pousser à renoncer trop tôt, pourquoi ces pensées négatives ne sont pas la réalité, et surtout, comment reprendre le contrôle pour changer ta vie.

Abonne-toi à OseVivre pour plus de conseils pratiques sur la discipline, la confiance en soi, et le développement personnel.

title: Machine à pain : en a-t-on vraiment besoin ?
description:
De nombreux Français ont rangé leur machine à pain au placard.
Pourtant, il y a quelques années, surfant sur la mode du « fait maison », la machine à pain a investi les plans de travail, comme les sorbetières ou les yaourtières. 
Les passionnés de cuisine ont tous acheté une MAP, comprendre machine à pain. Ils sont entrés dans la communauté des mappeurs et des mappeuses.   
En 2007, les MAP partaient comme des petits pains, plus de 900 000 vendues. Mais aujourd'hui, les ventes sont en baisse. 
Pourquoi les machines à pain ont quitté les cuisines pour les caves ?   
Comment les fabricants se relancent-ils sur le marché ? La machine à pain pourra-t-elle un jour remplacer le boulanger?
 Réalisateur : Lucile Degoud
tags: ('reportage', 'documentaire', '100% MAG', '100 Mag', 'DIY', 'machine à pain', 'MAP', 'pain', 'brioche', 'éléctroménager')

title: Les pensées métamorphosent le cerveau lui-même. - Stanislaw Jerzy Lec
description: Cette citation de Stanislaw Jerzy Lec signifie que nos pensées ont un impact direct sur notre cerveau, qui change et s'adapte en fonction de nos réflexions et de notre façon de penser. En d'autres termes, la façon dont nous pensons et les perspectives que nous adoptons peuvent transformer notre structure cérébrale et notre façon de percevoir le monde.

term: la paresse à l'ère du numérique
title: La paresse cognitive à l'ère de ChatGPT
description:
Saviez-vous que votre cerveau est naturellement paresseux ? 
Il cherche à économiser de l’énergie en prenant des raccourcis. C’est ce qu’on appelle la paresse cognitive : le système 1, rapide et intuitif, prend le dessus sur le système 2, plus lent, mais analytique et énergivore.
Avec les nouvelles technologies, cette tendance s’aggrave. L’effet Google a déjà montré qu’on retient moins les informations… mais qu’on se souvient mieux comment les retrouver. 
Envie d’en savoir plus ? Activez les notifications, la prochaine capsule arrive !
#IA #CerveauEnVeille #Entrainement #PenseeCritique  #FBILaFormationAutrement

term: la paresse à l'ère du numérique
title: Apprendre à marcher à l’ère du numérique | Olivier Crouzet | TEDxINSA
description:
Diplômé en informatique, Olivier Crouzet devient en 2000 directeur des études à EPITECH aux côtés de Nicolas Sadirac, avant de fonder l'École 42 avec celui-ci et Xavier Niel, patron de Free. Olivier Crouzet prend le rôle de directeur pédagogique de l'école, qui aborde l'enseignement de l'informatique de manière inédite : pas de professeurs, mais un apprentissage en "peer to peer".
Pour son talk, il abordera la nature primaire de l'apprentissage, de l'enfance à l'enseignement supérieur.

Olivier Couzet est directeur pédagogique de l'école 42.

This talk was given at a TEDx event using the TED conference format but independently organized by a local community. Learn more at http://ted.com/tedx

description:

📌 Sous les airs de douceur se cachent parfois des stratégies subtiles d’influence et de pouvoir. Recevez les 5 portraits passifs-agressifs dans une mini série de mails 👉https://bit.ly/portraits_passifs_agressifs

L’audace d’être soi - Clarté et lucidité dans un monde de faux. Par Randa BR

Dans un monde saturé de bruit, d’artifices et de manipulation, retrouver la clarté devient une nécessité vitale. 

L’audace d’être soi est un espace pour décrypter la réalité sans filtre, rétablir une réflexion lucide et retrouver du sens dans un monde de confusion et de faux-semblants.
Ici, on parle psychologie, société, philosophie… et tout ce qui éclaire la condition humaine.

title: Pourquoi ta famille déteste ta différence – La réponse brutale de Nietzsche
description:
Ta famille ne te supporte plus… simplement parce que tu es différent ? Derrière cette douleur silencieuse se cache une vérité profonde que Nietzsche avait déjà révélée : la masse déteste toujours celui qui ose penser par lui-même. Dans cette vidéo, tu découvriras pourquoi ton rejet n’est pas une faiblesse, mais une preuve de force intérieure.

👉 Nous allons explorer :

Pourquoi la différence dérange et attire le mépris silencieux.

Comment Nietzsche voyait le rejet du “troupeau” comme une étape nécessaire pour devenir soi-même.

De quelle façon ta douleur actuelle peut se transformer en puissance intérieure.

Le chemin du surhomme : vivre librement sans attendre l’approbation de ta famille.

🎥 Si tu es fatigué d’être incompris, si tu portes ce poids du rejet familial, reste jusqu’à la fin. Tu comprendras que ta différence n’est pas une malédiction… mais ton plus grand honneur.

💬 Dis-moi en commentaire : “Je choisis d’assumer ma différence.”
Ta voix compte. Ton témoignage peut résonner avec d’autres qui vivent la même douleur.

#Nietzsche #PsychologieFamiliale #PhilosophieDeVie #RejetFamilial #ÊtreDifférent

title: Méthode pour quand on pense trop
description: Ça t’arrives d’avoir l’impression de trop penser ? Et que plus tu essayes d’arrêter de penser, pire c’est ? Je te propose un autre exercice tiré de la méthode foutez-vous la paix, tout simple, pour redescendre sur terre.

title: जिज्ञासा | मृत्यु से पहले मुक्ति का एहसास | Experience salvation before death | HD | Asharamji Bapu
description:
Jigyasa | Mrityu se pahle mukti ka ehsaas | HD | Sant Shri Asharamji Bapu
ऐसा क्या कारण है कि आधुनिक समय में मानव समाज शोषित और परेशान दिखता है ? इसका उत्तर देते हुए पूज्य बापूजी समझाते हैं कि मुखिया चाहे घर का हो अथवा समाज का, यदि वासना को नियंत्रित करके आवश्यकतापूर्ति में लग जाए, तो सभी सुखी होंगे । साथ ही इस सत्संग से जानिए वो उत्तम जिज्ञासा जो मनुष्य को जीतेजी ही मुक्ति का एहसास करा देती है ।

title: डिजिटल युग की उलझनें | Challenges of Digital Age
description:
In today’s fast-paced digital era, we are more connected than ever, communicating across continents through social media, television, and technology. Yet, despite this vast network of interaction, many are experiencing increasing inner turmoil, stress, and mental exhaustion.

In this profound message, H.H. Sant Rajinder Singh Ji Maharaj lovingly explains how excessive outer communication draws our attention away from our inner peace. As we attempt to do more in less time, our lives become filled with stress and strain.

आज के डिजिटल युग में, हम पहले से कहीं अधिक जुड़े हुए हैं, सोशल मीडिया, टेलीविज़न और तकनीक के माध्यम से हम दुनिया भर के लोगों से संवाद कर रहे हैं। लेकिन इतनी बाहरी बातचीत के बावजूद, हमारे भीतर अशांति, तनाव और मानसिक थकान बढ़ती जा रही है।

संत राजिंदर सिंह जी महाराज इस प्रेरणादायक संदेश में समझाते हैं कि जब हमारा ध्यान बाहरी दुनिया की ओर अधिक हो जाता है, तो हम अपने भीतर की शांति से दूर हो जाते हैं। जब हम सीमित समय में बहुत कुछ करने का प्रयास करते हैं, तो तनाव और दबाव स्वाभाविक हो जाते हैं।
tags: ('Spirituality', 'meditation', 'how to meditate', 'Do You Get Started With Spirituality', 'Mysticism', 'spiritual journey', 'spiritual awakening', 'enlightenment', 'Sant Rajinder Singh Ji Maharaj', 'Sant Rajinder Singh', 'Meditation', 'Science of Spirituality', 'spiritual practice', 'what is spirituality', 'spiritual growth')

title: क्रोध ,निराशा ,उदास नकारात्मक विचार, नींद न आना ,शक होना ऐसा होता है जानिए इलाज
description:
Join Join WhatsApp Group: https://chat.whatsapp.com/I2GZcvzukfwHQ3z0bQKoI2

#मानसिकस्वास्थ्य #MentalHealth #क्रोधपरनियंत्रण #डिप्रेशन #नींदकीसमस्या  
#नकारात्मकविचार #शांतमन #योगसेचिकित्सा #MeditationBenefits #StressRelief  
#अनिद्राकाइलाज #SelfHealing #PositiveVibes #EmotionalWellbeing #mentalpreparation 

डॉ. दीपक केळकर  कहते है  ........

क्रोध, निराशा, उदासी, नकारात्मक सोच, नींद न आना और शक जैसी मानसिक परेशानियाँ – जानिए इसका इलाज

क्या आपको बार-बार गुस्सा आता है? हर बात में निराशा और उदासी महसूस होती है? हर समय नकारात्मक विचार आते हैं, नींद ठीक से नहीं आती और लोगों पर शक होने लगा है? अगर हाँ, तो ये संकेत हैं कि आपका मानसिक स्वास्थ्य खतरे में है।

👉 यह सब डिप्रेशन, एंग्जायटी या स्ट्रेस का परिणाम हो सकता है।
👉 इसे नज़रअंदाज़ करना आपकी सेहत के लिए नुकसानदायक हो सकता है।

इलाज क्या है?
✅ योग और ध्यान: रोज़ाना मेडिटेशन और प्राणायाम मन को शांत करते हैं।
✅ दिनचर्या में सुधार: समय पर सोना-जागना, हेल्दी डाइट और नियमित व्यायाम।
✅ मन की बात करें: किसी अपने से बात करें, या प्रोफेशनल काउंसलिंग लें।
✅ नकारात्मकता से दूरी: सोशल मीडिया या नेगेटिव लोगों से थोड़ा ब्रेक लें।
✅ आवश्यक हो तो डॉक्टर की सलाह लें: मानसिक स्वास्थ्य भी उतना ही ज़रूरी है जितना शारीरिक।

🌿 याद रखें – मानसिक शांति, जीवन की सबसे बड़ी पूंजी है। इसे नज़रअंदाज़ न करें।

क्रोध, निराशा, उदासी, नकारात्मक विचार, नींद न आना, और शक — ये सभी मानसिक तनाव, अवसाद (डिप्रेशन), या चिंता (anxiety) के संकेत हो सकते हैं। इन समस्याओं का समाधान संभव है, लेकिन सही दिशा और नियमित प्रयास जरूरी होते हैं।

🔍 पहले कारण जानिए:
तनावपूर्ण जीवनशैली

अतीत की कोई तकलीफ या ट्रॉमा

नींद की कमी और थकान

रिश्तों में तनाव या टूटन

हॉर्मोनल बदलाव (जैसे थायरॉइड, पीरियड्स से जुड़ी समस्याएँ)

नकारात्मक सोच की आदत या आत्म-संदेह

✅ समाधान / इलाज (प्राकृतिक और व्यावहारिक तरीके):
🧘‍♂️ 1. मेडिटेशन और प्राणायाम:
अनुलोम-विलोम, भ्रामरी और सुखपूर्वक प्राणायाम रोज 15-20 मिनट करें।

मन शांत होगा, नींद बेहतर होगी, और नकारात्मकता कम होगी।

🏃‍♀️ 2. नियमित व्यायाम:
सुबह की सैर, योग, हल्की एक्सरसाइज़ से शरीर में डोपामिन और सेरोटोनिन जैसे अच्छे हार्मोन निकलते हैं, जो मूड को बेहतर बनाते हैं।

📵 3. मोबाइल और सोशल मीडिया डिटॉक्स:
बहुत अधिक स्क्रीन टाइम भी नींद और मानसिक स्वास्थ्य को बिगाड़ता है। एक समय तय करें और उससे ज़्यादा इस्तेमाल न करें।

✍️ 4. जर्नलिंग करें:
रोज़ रात को सोने से पहले 5 पॉज़िटिव बातें लिखें।

जो चीज़ें आपको परेशान कर रही हैं, उन्हें लिखकर समझने की कोशिश करें — यह दिमाग को हल्का करता है।

🛏️ 5. नींद सुधारें:
एक ही समय पर सोने और उठने की आदत बनाएं।

सोने से पहले मोबाइल न देखें, हल्की किताब पढ़ें या ध्यान करें।

🌿 6. आयुर्वेदिक उपाय:
अश्वगंधा या ब्राह्मी जैसे जड़ी-बूटियों से तनाव कम होता है। लेकिन डॉक्टर से सलाह जरूर लें।

🤝 7. बात करें:
किसी भरोसेमंद दोस्त, परिवारजन या थैरेपिस्ट/काउंसलर से बात करें। मन की बात बांटने से मन हल्का होता है।

🚨 कब डॉक्टर से मिलें?
अगर ये लक्षण:

2 हफ्तों से ज्यादा बने हुए हैं,

आत्महत्या जैसे विचार आ रहे हैं,

रोज़मर्रा के काम प्रभावित हो रहे हैं,

तो मानसिक स्वास्थ्य विशेषज्ञ (psychiatrist या psychologist) से मिलना ज़रूरी है।

text:
क्रोध ,निराशा ,उदास नकारात्मक विचार, नींद न आना ,शक होना ऐसा होता है जानिए इलाजJoin Join WhatsApp Group: https://chat.whatsapp.com/I2GZcvzukfwHQ3z0bQKoI2

#मानसिकस्वास्थ्य #MentalHealth #क्रोधपरनियंत्रण #डिप्रेशन #नींदकीसमस्या  
#नकारात्मकविचार #शांतमन #योगसेचिकित्सा #MeditationBenefits #StressRelief  
#अनिद्राकाइलाज #SelfHealing #PositiveVibes #EmotionalWellbeing #mentalpreparation 

डॉ. दीपक केळकर  कहते है  ........

क्रोध, निराशा, उदासी, नकारात्मक सोच, नींद न आना और शक जैसी मानसिक परेशानियाँ – जानिए इसका इलाज

क्या आपको बार-बार गुस्सा आता है? हर बात में निराशा और उदासी महसूस होती है? हर समय नकारात्मक विचार आते हैं, नींद ठीक से नहीं आती और लोगों पर शक होने लगा है? अगर हाँ, तो ये संकेत हैं कि आपका मानसिक स्वास्थ्य खतरे में है।

👉 यह सब डिप्रेशन, एंग्जायटी या स्ट्रेस का परिणाम हो सकता है।
👉 इसे नज़रअंदाज़ करना आपकी सेहत के लिए नुकसानदायक हो सकता है।

इलाज क्या है?
✅ योग और ध्यान: रोज़ाना मेडिटेशन और प्राणायाम मन को शांत करते हैं।
✅ दिनचर्या में सुधार: समय पर सोना-जागना, हेल्दी डाइट और नियमित व्यायाम।
✅ मन की बात करें: किसी अपने से बात करें, या प्रोफेशनल काउंसलिंग लें।
✅ नकारात्मकता से दूरी: सोशल मीडिया या नेगेटिव लोगों से थोड़ा ब्रेक लें।
✅ आवश्यक हो तो डॉक्टर की सलाह लें: मानसिक स्वास्थ्य भी उतना ही ज़रूरी है जितना शारीरिक।

🌿 याद रखें – मानसिक शांति, जीवन की सबसे बड़ी पूंजी है। इसे नज़रअंदाज़ न करें।

क्रोध, निराशा, उदासी, नकारात्मक विचार, नींद न आना, और शक — ये सभी मानसिक तनाव, अवसाद (डिप्रेशन), या चिंता (anxiety) के संकेत हो सकते हैं। इन समस्याओं का समाधान संभव है, लेकिन सही दिशा और नियमित प्रयास जरूरी होते हैं।

🔍 पहले कारण जानिए:
तनावपूर्ण जीवनशैली

अतीत की कोई तकलीफ या ट्रॉमा

नींद की कमी और थकान

रिश्तों में तनाव या टूटन

हॉर्मोनल बदलाव (जैसे थायरॉइड, पीरियड्स से जुड़ी समस्याएँ)

नकारात्मक सोच की आदत या आत्म-संदेह

✅ समाधान / इलाज (प्राकृतिक और व्यावहारिक तरीके):
🧘‍♂️ 1. मेडिटेशन और प्राणायाम:
अनुलोम-विलोम, भ्रामरी और सुखपूर्वक प्राणायाम रोज 15-20 मिनट करें।

मन शांत होगा, नींद बेहतर होगी, और नकारात्मकता कम होगी।

🏃‍♀️ 2. नियमित व्यायाम:
सुबह की सैर, योग, हल्की एक्सरसाइज़ से शरीर में डोपामिन और सेरोटोनिन जैसे अच्छे हार्मोन निकलते हैं, जो मूड को बेहतर बनाते हैं।

📵 3. मोबाइल और सोशल मीडिया डिटॉक्स:
बहुत अधिक स्क्रीन टाइम भी नींद और मानसिक स्वास्थ्य को बिगाड़ता है। एक समय तय करें और उससे ज़्यादा इस्तेमाल न करें।

✍️ 4. जर्नलिंग करें:
रोज़ रात को सोने से पहले 5 पॉज़िटिव बातें लिखें।

जो चीज़ें आपको परेशान कर रही हैं, उन्हें लिखकर समझने की कोशिश करें — यह दिमाग को हल्का करता है।

🛏️ 5. नींद सुधारें:
एक ही समय पर सोने और उठने की आदत बनाएं।

सोने से पहले मोबाइल न देखें, हल्की किताब पढ़ें या ध्यान करें।

🌿 6. आयुर्वेदिक उपाय:
अश्वगंधा या ब्राह्मी जैसे जड़ी-बूटियों से तनाव कम होता है। लेकिन डॉक्टर से सलाह जरूर लें।

🤝 7. बात करें:
किसी भरोसेमंद दोस्त, परिवारजन या थैरेपिस्ट/काउंसलर से बात करें। मन की बात बांटने से मन हल्का होता है।

🚨 कब डॉक्टर से मिलें?
अगर ये लक्षण:

2 हफ्तों से ज्यादा बने हुए हैं,

आत्महत्या जैसे विचार आ रहे हैं,

रोज़मर्रा के काम प्रभावित हो रहे हैं,

तो मानसिक स्वास्थ्य विशेषज्ञ (psychiatrist या psychologist) से मिलना ज़रूरी है।Dr. Deepak Kelkar

title: Overthinking se kaise bachein? How to stop overthinking?
description:
Jyada soch se kaise bachein? Sochne ki bimari kya hai? Overthinking se kaise bachein?

For appointments at Renowa Care, pls call 9013821178, 9999808648
Email- renowacare@gmail.com, tripathipraveen1986@gmail.com
Web- www.renowacare.com 

Agar aap khud se depression ko theek karne ke techniques seekhna chahte hain, to aap humare course 'depression se bahar kaise niklein' ko join kar sakte hain. Iss course mein Dr. Praveen Tripathi ne cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT) ki techniques ko use karna sikhaya hai. Inhi techniques ka istemaal depression ke patients ki counselling mein kiya jaata hai. Course ko join karne ke liye, neeche diye link ko click karein
https://www.drpraveentripathi.com

Overthinking ya fir zyada sochna kayi logon ko bahut pareshan karta hai. Kayi logon ki ye shikayat hoti hai ki khayal unke mann mein chalte rehte hain, vichaar unke mann mein aate rehte hain. Excessive thinking ya overthinking se logon ka mood kharab ho jaata hai aur time bhi waste hota hai. Kayi baar neend ki dikkat bhi hone lagti hai. Overthinking ke sabse badi problem ye hai ki wo apne aap ko aur badhati rehti hai aur insaan ko past mein le jaati hai. Jo log past mein jeete hain wo apna future theek se nahi bana pate. Iss video mein Dr Praveen Tripathi, jo ki ek senior psychiatrist aur sexual disorders specialist hain, wo overthinking ki problem ke baare mein discuss kar rahe hain.

Jyada soch se kaise bachein? Sochne ki bimari kya hai? Overthinking se kaise bachein?

Excessive thinking is a common problem that impacts a large number of people. People often complain that their mind just doesn't stop working. A useless chain of thought which often includes imaginary conversations is an exercise in futility. After some time, people feel tired and sad. If this excessive thinking is happening at night time, it may disturb the onset of sleep. In this video, Dr. Praveen Tripathi, who is a senior psychiatrist and sexual disorders specialist, discusses the problem of overthinking and how it can be controlled.

Dr. Praveen Tripathi is a renowned psychiatrist who practices in Delhi-NCR. He did his MBBS from University College of Medical Sciences (UCMS, Delhi) and MD (Psychiatry) from the prestigious Institute of Human Behavior and Allied Sciences (IHBAS, Delhi). He also underwent training at the world-renowned Mount Sinai School of Medicine, New York, USA, and Kansas University Medical Centre, Kansas, USA. He is one amongst the few Indian doctors who have cleared the prestigious United States Clinical Skill examination that evaluates a doctor's clinical competency. Dr. Tripathi underwent training in the use of transcranial magnetic stimulation therapy from Harvard Medical Centre, which is the topmost medical college in the USA.

Email- tripathipraveen1986@gmail.com
Web- www.renowacare.com

text:
Overthinking se kaise bachein? How to stop overthinking?Jyada soch se kaise bachein? Sochne ki bimari kya hai? Overthinking se kaise bachein?

For appointments at Renowa Care, pls call 9013821178, 9999808648
Email- renowacare@gmail.com, tripathipraveen1986@gmail.com
Web- www.renowacare.com 

Agar aap khud se depression ko theek karne ke techniques seekhna chahte hain, to aap humare course 'depression se bahar kaise niklein' ko join kar sakte hain. Iss course mein Dr. Praveen Tripathi ne cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT) ki techniques ko use karna sikhaya hai. Inhi techniques ka istemaal depression ke patients ki counselling mein kiya jaata hai. Course ko join karne ke liye, neeche diye link ko click karein
https://www.drpraveentripathi.com

Overthinking ya fir zyada sochna kayi logon ko bahut pareshan karta hai. Kayi logon ki ye shikayat hoti hai ki khayal unke mann mein chalte rehte hain, vichaar unke mann mein aate rehte hain. Excessive thinking ya overthinking se logon ka mood kharab ho jaata hai aur time bhi waste hota hai. Kayi baar neend ki dikkat bhi hone lagti hai. Overthinking ke sabse badi problem ye hai ki wo apne aap ko aur badhati rehti hai aur insaan ko past mein le jaati hai. Jo log past mein jeete hain wo apna future theek se nahi bana pate. Iss video mein Dr Praveen Tripathi, jo ki ek senior psychiatrist aur sexual disorders specialist hain, wo overthinking ki problem ke baare mein discuss kar rahe hain.

Jyada soch se kaise bachein? Sochne ki bimari kya hai? Overthinking se kaise bachein?

Excessive thinking is a common problem that impacts a large number of people. People often complain that their mind just doesn't stop working. A useless chain of thought which often includes imaginary conversations is an exercise in futility. After some time, people feel tired and sad. If this excessive thinking is happening at night time, it may disturb the onset of sleep. In this video, Dr. Praveen Tripathi, who is a senior psychiatrist and sexual disorders specialist, discusses the problem of overthinking and how it can be controlled.

Dr. Praveen Tripathi is a renowned psychiatrist who practices in Delhi-NCR. He did his MBBS from University College of Medical Sciences (UCMS, Delhi) and MD (Psychiatry) from the prestigious Institute of Human Behavior and Allied Sciences (IHBAS, Delhi). He also underwent training at the world-renowned Mount Sinai School of Medicine, New York, USA, and Kansas University Medical Centre, Kansas, USA. He is one amongst the few Indian doctors who have cleared the prestigious United States Clinical Skill examination that evaluates a doctor's clinical competency. Dr. Tripathi underwent training in the use of transcranial magnetic stimulation therapy from Harvard Medical Centre, which is the topmost medical college in the USA.

Email- tripathipraveen1986@gmail.com
Web- www.renowacare.comDr Praveen Tripathi Psychiatry

नमस्कार दोस्तों मैं हूं राजन आप देख रहे हैं हमारा चैनल दिलीप टेलर्स एंड बुटीक दोस्तों इस चैनल पर आपको रोजाना सिलाई से जुड़ी हुई रोचक वीडियोस मिलती रहती हैं मेरी कोशिश आप सबको सरल तरीके से कटिंग और सिलाई बताने का होता है आपको हमारे चैनल पर कटोरी ब्लाऊज, बेल्ट ब्लाउज, सिंगल टैक्स वाले ब्लाउज, कॉलर वाले ब्लाउज, साथ ही आजकल चल रहे नए-नए ब्लाउज के डिजाइन, फैंसी ब्लाउज, डिजाइनर सूट ,प्लाजो पटियाला ,चूड़ीदार और सभी तरीके से लेडीज वियर की सिलाई और कटिंग का वीडियो मिलता है दोस्तों अगर आप मुझसे सिलाई और कटिंग सीखना चाहते हैं आपको अगर किसी भी तरह की समस्या है तो आप मुझसे व्हाट्सएप पर या हमारे मोबाइल ऐप्प पर सिलाई सीख सकते हैं और अपनी समस्या का समाधान पा सकते हैं |

दोस्तों अगर आप हमारे चैनल को पहली बार देख रहे हैं और इसी तरह की वीडियो रोजाना देखना चाहते हैं तो आप हमारे चैनल को सब्सक्राइब जरूर कर लीजिए और साथ ही बैल बटन को भी दबा दीजिए ताकि हमारे हर एक वीडियो का मैसेज आपको मिलता रहे साथ ही वीडियो को लाइक और शेयर भी जरूर करें|

title: 洪嘉豪 Hung Kaho - 好奇殺死愛 Curiosity (Official Lyrics Video)
description:
華納男孩#洪嘉豪 首張個人EP 【#Curiosity】
因為未知，所以好奇。
因為好奇，所以尋找。
用音樂滿足你的好奇心
.
立即聽: https://hungkaho.lnk.to/Curiosity_EP
.
《#好奇殺死愛》

曲：Larry Wong
詞：林若寧
編：Larry Wong / 周俊傑
監：Larry Wong

別要對謠傳你　太好奇
為了好奇而失去　我趣味
寧願努力的包庇
愚蠢得一笑已忘記　是與非

就算騙徒仍信你　怕別離
害怕你留言一句　對不起
明知一發現你　難堪的我代價不菲
別帶偷聽器

祈求知道你不多　讓我自然扮傻
明白你男朋友加起總數多　無不可
原來真相太清楚　令我疑惑暴露更多
別要一語道破迫使你逃避我　何不欺騙我

望見你神情尷尬　怕現形
別對我們殘忍到　太清醒
原因假也動聽　誰的短訊別看得清
你也不必掃興

祈求知道你不多　讓我自然扮傻
明白你男朋友加起總數多　無不可
原來真相太清楚　令我疑惑暴露更多
別要一語道破迫使你逃避我　何不欺騙我

無用專一　便宜的俘虜著我
識穿你便會更生疏

謠言都當小風波　便繼續能扮傻
盲目聽從情侶溫馨的教唆　無不可
原來知你更加多　受到懲罰亦是我麼
你開口講個玩笑敷衍當娛樂我　求好心騙我

Connect with Hung Kaho
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HungKAHOoffi...
Instagram: http://instagram.com/hungkaho
Website: http://www.warnermusic.com.hk

© 2019 Warner Music Hong Kong Ltd.

term: 思考を機械にアウトソーシングする
title: 脳と機械をつなぐ！ブレイン・マシン・インターフェースの世界 　→ マウスやキーボードのいらない未来のコンピュータ操作。
description:
もし、頭で考えただけでコンピュータを操作できる未来が来たら、どう思いますか？

実は、そんな世界がもうすぐ現実になろうとしているんです！
それが「ブレイン・マシン・インターフェース」、通称BMIという技術！

仕組みはシンプル。
脳が発する微弱な電気信号を読み取って、コンピュータやロボットに伝えるというもの。
これにより、手を使わずに文字を入力したり、ゲームをプレイすることだって可能になるんです！

今はまだ研究段階だけど、将来的には誰でも使える時代が来るかもしれません。
特に、身体が不自由な人の生活を劇的に変える可能性も秘めています。

もちろん課題もあります。
安全性やデータプライバシーなど、慎重にクリアしなければいけない壁はたくさん。

でも、それを乗り越えれば、マウスもキーボードも必要ない未来が待っているかもしれないんです！

#ブレインマシンインターフェース
#BMI
#脳とコンピュータ
#未来のインターフェース
#考えるだけで操作
#次世代技術
#脳科学
#神経工学
#未来の暮らし
#SFが現実に
#未来技術

#テクノロジー解説
#教育系YouTube
#自由研究ネタ
#科学好きと繋がりたい
#マウス不要時代
#頭の中の未来
#未来生活
#ロング動画も見てね
#短く学べる
#BrainMachineInterface
#BMItechnology
#MindControlTech
#NeuralInterface

今はまだ研究段階だけど、将来的には誰でも使える時代が来るかもしれません。
特に、身体が不自由な人の生活を劇的に変える可能性も秘めています。

もちろん課題もあります。
安全性やデータプライバシーなど、慎重にクリアしなければいけない壁はたくさん。

でも、それを乗り越えれば、マウスもキーボードも必要ない未来が待っているかもしれないんです！

Title: 脳と機械をつなぐ！ブレイン・マシン・インターフェースの世界 　→ マウスやキーボードのいらない未来のコンピュータ操作。#ブレインマシンインターフェース#BMI#脳とコンピュータ

Channel: "Cutting-edge Survival Lab"

Description: ▼本編はこちら
https://youtu.be/6CXzGs14r0c

もし、頭で考えただけでコンピュータを操作できる未来が来たら、どう思いますか？

実は、そんな世界がもうすぐ現実になろうとしているんです！
それが「ブレイン・マシン・インターフェース」、通称BMIという技術！

仕組みはシンプル。
脳が発する微弱な電気信号を読み取って、コンピュータやロボットに伝えるというもの。
これにより、手を使わずに文字を入力したり、ゲームをプレイすることだって可能になるんです！

今はまだ研究段階だけど、将来的には誰でも使える時代が来るかもしれません。
特に、身体が不自由な人の生活を劇的に変える可能性も秘めています。

もちろん課題もあります。
安全性やデータプライバシーなど、慎重にクリアしなければいけない壁はたくさん。

でも、それを乗り越えれば、マウスもキーボードも必要ない未来が待っているかもしれないんです！

title: As descobertas sobre o que se passa no cérebro enquanto morremos
description:
Jimo Borjigin, professora associada de Neurologia e Fisiologia Molecular e Integrativa da Universidade de Michigan, tem se dedicado a estudar o que acontece no cérebro humano quando estamos morrendo. 

E o que ela descobriu — assegura — vai contra o que se imagina.

É o que explica nesse video nosso repórter André Biernath. Confira.

#bbcnewsbrasil #neurociencia #cerebro

title: BIOIMPEDÂNCIA: o que é e como funciona
description:
A nutricionista Tatiana Zanin não só te ensina como se pesar corretamente numa balança de bioimpedância, mas também quais são os valores normais para porcentagem de gordura e massa muscular de acordo com o sexo e a idade. 

Para saber qual é a sua composição corporal, fazer direitinho a bioimpedância e conhecer a sua porcentagem de gordura e massa gorda de verddade, é importante se pesar corretamente e sempre da mesma forma. É isso que a Tati ensina para você poder comparar os resultados e saber se o seu treino e dieta estão alcançando os resultados que se pretende ou é necessário ajustar.
 
A bioimpedância além de mostrar o seu IMC, também apresenta parâmetros de densidade óssea, gordura e quantidade de massa muscular do seu corpo e pode ser feito a cada 3, 6 ou 12 meses. 

Saiba mais sobre bioimpedância em nosso site:
https://www.tuasaude.com/bioimpedancia/

--
Inscreva-se no canal!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tuasaude

channel: Frente Parlamentar da Indústria de Máquinas
title: Máquinas Modernas: Por Que São Cruciais Para o Brasil?
description: O presidente do Conselho de Administração da ABIMAQ, Gino Paulucci, explica por que é crucial modernizar o parque industrial brasileiro. Ele destaca que máquinas antigas consomem mais energia e produzem menos, enquanto as novas tecnologias garantem mais eficiência, qualidade e sustentabilidade para o país.

title: A preguiça foi inventada — e você acreditou nisso.
description:
“Preguiça” é só um nome bonito pra esconder nossa falta de preparo, direção ou coragem.
Criaram esse termo pra justificar a inércia e a fraqueza — e você comprou essa história.
Mas a verdade é simples: não existe preguiça, só mentes adormecidas no lugar errado.

#QuebraDeCrenças #PNLNaPrática #DesperteSuaMente #NeurociênciaComportamental

title: Você Terceiriza Sua Memória? Os Perigos da Dependência Digital!
description:
Você Terceiriza Sua Memória? Os Perigos da Dependência Digital!

Neste SHORT, exploramos como a dependência de dispositivos digitais está 'terceirizando' nossa memória. Descubra os impactos negativos dessa prática no seu cérebro e aprenda estratégias para fortalecer sua memória naturalmente. Pare de confiar apenas na tecnologia e comece a treinar sua mente para ser mais forte e independente!

Viva bem. Lembre bem.
Renato Alves 😘

====================

🌎 Master Memory Brasil
Quando garoto, eu adorava assistir as pessoas que iam na televisão memorizar um monte de coisas. Eu sempre achei que memorização era um dom sobrenatural, inacessível as pessoas comuns. Anos depois eu estava prestes a reprovar na faculdade. Era a segunda vez que aconteceria e eu estava desesperado. Foi quando um amigo me emprestou um livro com técnicas de memorização que transformaram a minha vida. A memorização salvou a minha prova e a minha motivação nos estudos. O que eu nunca poderia imaginar é que 10 anos depois eu receberia o título de Melhor Memória do Brasil...

👉 Clique para ver minha biografia » https://renatoalves.com.br/minha_historia

🌎 A Maior Escola de Memorização do Mundo.
Temos orgulho de ser a primeira e a maior Escola de Memorização do mundo. Em 23 anos de mercado contabilizamos quase 1 milhão de alunos treinados nos módulos presenciais, online e através dos nossos materiais didáticos. Nossos cursos de memorização e leitura dinâmica à distância treinam alunos em 120 países e utilizam uma linguagem contemporânea que soluciona o problema de muito informação para pouco tempo. Venha você também fazer parte do nosso time de alunos que usam a memória com inteligência.

title: TRÊS FORMAS DE TERCEIRIZAR A PRODUÇÃO NA COMUNICAÇÃO VISUAL E QUANDO USAR CADA UMA DELAS.
description:
Essas são as formas de terceirizar a produção na Comunicação Visual e o momento de utilizar cada uma delas.

São três formas principais:

1 - Terceirizar toda a produção
2 - Terceirizar parte da produção
3 - Terceirizar parte do processo produtivo

E ainda existe a possibilidade de terceirizar a mão de obra. Esse mercado vem crescendo com velocidade.

Cada vez mais as empresas estão terceirizando serviços como o de instalação de fachadas em ACM.

title: "放弃也是一种智慧：成功的关键不是一直坚持！"🌟【15分钟讲解《残酷的成功法则》】
description:
[视频简介]

在这期视频中，我们将深入探讨《残酷的成功法则》一书的核心观点，揭示成功的科学背后真正有效的法则。
许多流传多年的成功法则其实并没有科学依据，甚至可能导致误导。
今天，我们将分析科学验证过的成功法则，并分享如何通过改变心态和策略来提升成功的概率。
许多人认为毅力是成功的关键，但为何我们常常难以保持毅力？
我们将揭示毅力的真正来源以及为什么过于执着于毅力可能反而影响成功。
积极自我激励的重要性
放弃的艺术：什么时候坚持，什么时候放弃？学会战略性放弃，集中资源于最重要的目标，才能让我们事半功倍。
本期视频将帮助你打破错误的成功观念，采用科学验证的成功法则，帮助你更有效地实现目标，迈向成功之路。
如果你喜欢这类内容，别忘了点赞、分享并订阅我们的频道，打开小铃铛提醒，不错过任何精彩视频！

description:
你有没有发现——
每天刷了无数条短视频，却什么也记不住？
手机里保存了几千张照片，却拼不出自己的完整人生？

我们正在经历一场前所未有的“数字失忆症”危机。
记忆被碎片化、外包给算法，
自我叙述的能力正在悄悄被剥夺。

这期节目，我们将深入剖析：
🔹 为什么我们越来越依赖“外部记忆”？
🔹 信息爆炸如何削弱了我们的思考力？
🔹 平台推荐机制正在如何定义“我是谁”？
🔹 以及——我们该如何重新找回属于自己的记忆与意义？

⚠️ 这不是一个科幻话题，这是你我每天正在真实经历的现实。

—

🎯 如果你正在经历注意力涣散、记忆模糊、生活被信息操控的感觉，那你一定不能错过本期内容。
